definition: disorderly and disruptive and not amenable to discipline or control; out of control
details:
adjective
- disorderly and disruptive and not amenable to discipline or control; out of control
= example: disorderly and disruptive and not amenable to discipline or control; out of control
= synonyms: confirmed
- noisy and lacking in restraint or discipline
= synonyms: boisterous
- unwilling to submit to authority
= example: unwilling to submit to authority
= synonyms: disobedient
